title: Release!
details: Please make it known! I will make a discord :0

title: Update!
description: I have fixed the games issues! Added Community and settings. And changed some ui. I added Ads. I am still aware YouTube doesn't work. Thanks for being supportive! There will be a discord soon!
details:
Game Stability Fixes
Resolved multiple issues affecting in-proxy game loading and performance. Games should now launch more reliably and run with fewer interruptions.

Community Section Added
Introduced a new Community area designed for user interaction, feedback sharing, and general discussion related to the proxy and its features.

Settings Page Implemented
Added a dedicated Settings panel, allowing users to manage available preferences and adjust proxy-related options from a centralized location.

UI Improvements
Updated and refined various UI elements to improve navigation, layout consistency, and overall user experience across the site. (Also games layout)

Ads Integration
Implemented advertisements to help support ongoing development and server costs.

Known Issues
YouTube functionality is still not operational and remains a known issue that is being investigated.
